amendment.description: To make available from amount appropriates for "Research, Development, Test and Evaluation, Air Force", $7,000,000 AN/APG-68(V) radar development for F-16 aircraft.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3516 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3516 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Mikulski. (consideration: CR S7336; text: CR S7376) To make available from amount appropriates for "Research, Development, Test and Evaluation, Air Force", $7,000,000 AN/APG-68(V) radar development for F-16 aircraft.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3516 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3516 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Mikulski.
